title: Ticket #3272: -wide inconsistent between tools
description:
condor_q and condor_history both support -wide option, but they don't handle it in the same way. condor_status doesn't support -wide at all. condor_q pays attention to the console width when sizing columns, but condor_status always works to a console width of 80.

condor_status is especially problematic because it nearly always truncates the slot names on many pools. bbockelm has mentioned this in passing more than once.

the tools should all be modifed to support a non-truncating option (-wide), and to take advantage of console window widths > 80.
